topic.topicDialog: If a student has missed a lesson, you can always assign the lesson to them for homework or assign it at the end of the year for revision.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, access the course in which you created the lesson and click on the Lessons bar.
Use the action drop-down arrow next to the Lesson title to select Assign this lesson to your Teaching Groups.

In the pop up window, give your assignment a Name and Description.

Tick the box next to the Teaching Group, or expand the list of Students and tick individual names to allocate the Assignment to them.
Choose a Start Date and End Date for the Assignment and once completed, click OK.
Your assignment will then appear in your Assignments panel on the Course page.
